articles.author: Zack Sharf
articles.title: Hilarie Burton Slams ‘Bigot’ Candace Cameron Bure Over Great American Family Ignoring Gay Couples: You’re ‘Disgusting’ - Variety
articles.description: Candace Cameron Bure has ignited outrage after telling The Wall Street Journal that her new television home at Great American Family will not spotlight gay couples in leading roles. Bure, who left Hallmark Channel for Great American Family and is serving as i…
